# Playwright Test Automation Framework

This workspace contains a comprehensive Playwright test automation framework with TypeScript support for cross-browser testing.

## Framework Structure
- Page Object Model patterns for maintainable test architecture
- Utilities for common test operations
- Configuration for multiple browsers and environments
- Example tests demonstrating best practices

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all test files
- Follow Page Object Model patterns
- Implement proper test data management
- Use Playwright's built-in assertions and locators
- Maintain clear test documentation

## Testing Standards
- Write descriptive test names and descriptions
- Use proper test organization and grouping
- Implement proper error handling and reporting
- Follow cross-browser testing best practices
